notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription:
Wilk Productions wants its shareholders to earn a 12% return on their investment in the company. At what value
would Wilk stock be priced if the company paid $2.75 per share in constant annual dividends forever?
